name: Atomi
description:
Get ready for a challenge!
ATOMI is a simple addictive puzzle game!!
CHOOSE logic blocks and BUILD a path for Atomi to catch the atoms and repair his spaceship.
Explore over 200 levels in 5 differents universes.

FEATURES :
- Logic game
-200 challenges through 5 universes
- 2 difficulty levels
- No stress and no timer
- A simple, functional application
- No in-game purchases and no invasive advertising
